aboutParagraph: I'm a student at Rutgers Unviersity majoring in Computer Science hoping to use my skills to further a career in Software Engineering. Currently seeking an internship or researchip opportunity that will allow me to utilize my problem solving skills and attention to detail to further develop my abilities in the field of computer science.

_READcommentForBLOGS._blogEssay: READ BELLOW FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON MANIPULATING PARAGRAPHS!

_READcommentForBLOGS._step1: copy only the first object; from blogId to blogEssay
_READcommentForBLOGS._step2: paste at the bottom of the blogs[] bellow
_READcommentForBLOGS._step3: delete the underscore ( _ ) from each tag after pasting and make sure they are within curly braces {}
_READcommentForBLOGS._note: when dowloading images, save them on the assets >> blogImgs folder. Try to save small files. 2Mb max of image size.
_READcommentForBLOGS._note2: when copying and pasting objects, paste at the bottom of the array. When shown on the page, the filter shows them in reverse order.
_READcommentForBLOGS._note3: refer to configData.ts for what type of variables they are

blogs.blogSummary: This is a small summary of what the blog post is going to be about. About one or two sentences is needed for this to look nice. This is the third sentence of the summary of the most recent blog
